job.title: Senior Full Stack Cloud Engineer (Java/Spring)
job.description: Looking to fill several cloud opening ASAPbrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrulliDesign and implement full stack cloud solutions to include IaaS PaaS and SaaSliliDesign and deploy computing servicesliliImplement cloud based software as services offerings such as Amazon Google Apps Microsoft Azure Microsoft Office 365 and similar enterprise SaaS offeringsliliPerform DevOps functions May through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrChrisMonteroCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any
